The Peoria campus, one of four campuses that comprise the University of Illinois College of Medicine, has 280-plus residents and fellows enrolled. Clinical Care With our teaching affiliate partners, OSF Saint Francis Medical Center and UnityPoint Health – Methodist, the College of Medicine has access to more than 900 patient beds, a Level 1 Trauma Center and the only full-service tertiary hospital for kids in downstate Illinois. Both serve a metropolitan residential population of over 375,000 but draw patients from a population base of more than one million people.
